p: The following pseudotypes with luciferase reporters ( 55), A/Korea/426/68(H2N2) (KR/68), A/Vietnam/1194/2004(H5N1) (VN/04), and A/Hong Kong/1073/99(H9N2) (HK/99) were used. Serial two-fold dilutions of nanobody-Fc were made ranging from 32 nM to 1 pM. Influenza pseudotypes at a concentration of 1.0 × 10 6 RLU/well were then added to the nanobody-Fc dilutions and 1.0 × 10 4 293T cells were added to each well. Plates were incubated for 48 h at 37°C and 5% CO 2. Supernatant was then harvested, and plates were read using the GloMax Navigator (Promega) using the Promega GloMax Luminescence Quick-Read protocol.
